_title.title: Title alignment
_title.description: Set the alignment of the component title. Left: Aligns the title to the left of the container. Center: Aligns the title to the center of the container. Right: Aligns the title to the right of the container. The alignment automatically inverses for right-to-left languages. The default is `` which inherits the natural page direction.
